job title: Senior Principal Scientist/Associate Director, Antibody Discovery
job description:
Job description:

Sanofi is seeking a highly motivated candidate with an innovative mind set, experienced in microfluidic platforms for single cell characterization and transcriptome capture and analysis. The main objective for this candidate will be to establish droplet and chip based microfluidic platforms to capture immune repertoires. The candidate should be well versed in antibody discovery and development technologies. The candidate will be expected to coordinate research activities in a multi-disciplinary setting. This is a senior level position requiring scientific expertise and vision and excellent interpersonal skills.

Essential qualifications:

A Ph.D. degree and post doctoral experience in lithography and microfluidics with 3-5 years of experience in application of these platforms for biologics drug discovery and characterizations. Demonstrated successful experience in antibody/TCR research, preferably in an industry setting and experienced in leading and advancing projects are required. The candidate must have clear understanding of immunology and technical expertise in molecular and cell biology. In addition, excellent written and verbal communication skills are needed for this role.

Preferred qualifications:

Candidates with one or more of the following skills are highly desired: Thorough understanding of immune repertoire analysis and computation of large data sets. Prior experience with biotherapeutic discovery is highly desirable.
